name: Notion Daily, Weekly & Monthly Planner
description: Organise your life using this very simple and free Notion Daily, Weekly & Monthly Planner!What is included? Daily PlannerTrack your daily goals, habits, to-do's, and reflection. Weekly PlannerMonday to Friday daily schedule, goals, to-do's, and reflection. Monthly PlannerMonthly goals, to-do's, and reflection. Want a feature added? Let me know!
